channel.title: Official Website Approval Thread- With Permission
channel.description:
Hi everyone. I finnaly Got the O.K to post this thread. It will be stickied when miss Silabsoft comes back online. i do have permission to do this from Admin Team. It will be so that you can Get your Site Approved By Myself, admin or mod. The Link is:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,162047.msg1517317.html Who thinks is should be posted here?
Regards, ikick
